nodes.text: The First Battle of Iridonia occurred during the Great Sith War. It was a victory for the Galactic Republic that marked a turning point in the war. Little is known about the battle other than that Jedi-led Republic Military forces routed a combined Krath and Sith force. The Republic drove its enemies back, and in so doing, its war effort against the Sith gained significant momentum.
